action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of Tetris-like blocks in various colors. There are two purple L-shaped blocks, two red Z-shaped blocks, one orange T-shaped block, one yellow cross-shaped block, one red L-shaped block, and one yellow reverse L-shaped block. The background is white, and the blocks are scattered around without touching each other.
continue

DESCRIPTION: The image displays a collection of Tetris-like blocks in different colors. There are two larger blocks at the top and two smaller ones at the bottom. The top left block is dark blue, and the top right block is green. The bottom left block is light blue, and the bottom right block is grey. Each block is shaped like a "T" or a cross, with the central part of the cross slightly offset from the center. The blocks are not aligned perfectly and appear to be floating against a white background.
